profileAlternative.name: Karen Schettlinger
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Scientist
profileAlternative.summary:
I'm a passionate data geek. Even as a kid I loved counting things, structuring and ordering them and just in general, making sense of how things work. Up to today, the questions "How?" and "Why?" are what drive me - and the motivation, passion and stamina to find out the answers based on massive data sets.

(Please note that outside the EU, I require sponsorship / a working visa.)

aboutAlternative.text:
I'm a passionate data geek. Even as a kid I loved counting things, structuring and ordering them and just in general, making sense of how things work. Up to today, the questions "How?" and "Why?" are what drive me - and the motivation, passion and stamina to find out the answers based on massive data sets.

items: Featured in the article "Große Chancen durch große Daten" ("Big Chances by Big Data")
Multivariate Real-Time Signal Extraction by a Robust Adaptive Regression Filter
Online analysis of time series by the Qn estimator
Real time signal processing by adaptive repeated median filters
Robust online scale estimation in time series: A model-free approach
Machine learning techniques in intensive care monitoring
Computing the least quartile difference estimator in the plane
Online signal extraction by robust linear regression
Robust filters for intensive care monitoring: beyond the running median
Short Visit Grant for the Project "Statistical Analysis of Complex Data with Robust and Related Statistical Methods" (SACD)
Scholarship of the German Academic Exchange Services (DAAD)
Delivering Advertising Messages in a Campaign in Accordance with a Target Frequency or Frequency Range
